This site uses cookies from Google to deliver its services and to analyze traffic.

[Learn more](https://policies.google.com/technologies/cookies) Ok, Got it

```

ng analytics enable[options]
```

check

```

ng analytics on[options]
```

check

Enables analytics gathering and reporting for the user.

## [Options](https://angular.dev/cli/analytics/enable\#options)

`global`

Alias `g `

Configure analytics gathering and reporting globally in the caller's home directory.

Value Type `boolean` Default `false`
